caption: Keep flying in the dough I can tell the difference on the bagels for sure. Thx guys
Amazing bagels and amazing staff. Drove an hour to try this place after hearing about it from a friend. Definitely worth the drive. Thank you!
Ordered 30 rainbow bagels, they made them fresh to order in 5 minutes

I am obsessed with bagels and have enjoyed the bagels every time I have gone here, both the classic bagel and cream cheese as well as the bagel sandwiches. The reason I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 stars is that it takes such a long time to wait for the bagels after you order them. I think the most recent time I went there, I was standing around waiting for 25 minutes, which was a little frustrating.

I felt like I was IN New York. Wow beautiful and clean shop, in the middle of Lakeview.  Bagels were fresh and they even have lox!  Sam, the owner, is friendly and courteous.  Highly recommend it for your bagel needs. Prices were so reasonable.

Taste of New York Bagels was a pleasant & GOOD surprise for me! Ordered them the 1st time a wk ago that triple decker was GOOD! Ordered again today the hot turkey & pastrami sandwich was equally GOOD! They'll definitely be my 1st choice for a good sammich(yes I meant sammich!) 😁
Good bagels. Good cream cheese. Tell them if you need your bagel toasted. They wont ask.
Bagel is very good but the chicken noodle soup is by far the grossest thing I’ve ever have! It was freezing cold and completely inedible. Very disappointing!
Chicken soup was flavorless, barely any chicken, just awful. Bagel for the sandwich was not toasted. Smoothie was overpowering on the ginger.

Good food. I really wish you guys would pay closer attention to your delivery orders. For at least the third time we got our delivery with the beverages missing and one sandwich was just complete not what we ordered. I don’t know if you’re putting stuff in the wrong bags or just not reading the orders, but we definitely won’t be getting delivery again. Really disappointing that we had to pay for this.
I love the taste of the sandwiches 😋
Fantastic service, and great selection!!

If you're looking for a bagel sandwich to start off your morning or beat a hangover look no further! I highly recommend getting your sandwich on an everything bagel, and whenever I order one I always end up with a half dozen bagels that come warm in the bag. Very wallet-friendly and the staff are quick and attentive 😊
The bagel w/ lox spread was great but I got a chicken salad wrap and it was dry and disappointing. Would go again for bagel.
Great Hidden Gen
I picked up 5 bagels from here this morning. Egg, garlic, zaatar, rainbow. They were great. This place serves up quality product.

Even on a busy Saturday morning with tons of pickups, the service was quick and easy. I got an everything bagel with VEGAN cream cheese spread on the side. The spread isn’t store bought, so it’s not perfectly smooth because it’s more natural and homemade— which I appreciated. It was a great topping for my bagel. 🥯  They have a large selection of bagels and dairy-based toppings. I highly suggest you give this place a try.
Amazing bagels they have here. I don't know how they toss it but it is very different than any other tossed bagels that I have had before.
I've been on the hunt for the *perfect* NY bagel, and this place delivers.
Good service, delivery of food in the time stipulated by the application. I recommend
Fantastic bagels, fun cream cheese flavors, and really good fresh juice :)
Delicious!  Great cream cheese, perfect chewy bagels and really nice staff.   I look forward to stopping her in the morning before work.
The bagels here are the best in Chicago. They are very huge and chewy, with a variety to choose from. Friendly service too!

I ordered 70 rainbow colored bagels for a Pride event. The bagels were beautiful, baked fresh and still warm when they arrived. The crowd loved them!  They were also delivered on time and the company was easy to do business with. Thank you Taste of NY Bagels & Deli! Will be ordering from here again.
Amazing bagels and even better service.

Over the past few months I have been coming to enjoy breakfast here. Every time I’m surprised by the staff’s friendly faces and hard work. The team’s passion for making quality food is apparent in all their recipes. When you come in you feel transported to a deli in Brooklyn. It’s a true American small business. There have been improvements everyday for them to get used to the neighborhood, and I’m excited to see how they grow over the next few years.
I love this place. The flavored cream cheeses are very good and the staff are always super nice and friendly.
Delicious bagels and sandwiches, friendly staff, and a great New York atmosphere. I’ll be coming back!
Great bagel and cream cheese, a little pricier than I was expecting, though.
Excellent Authentic Bagel with Scrambled eggs and Cream Cheese!!!
Bagels did not taste fresh, iced coffee tasted horrible and the place was pretty dingy and grimey. Was excited to try it out but unfortunately I’ll be sticking to CBA down the street.
Best bagel I've had in Chicago, Period.  Service can be slow/disorganized but am willing to overlook given the quality of the bagels/sandwiches
Tuna melt was very plain tasting, would not order it again.  Bagels are delicious and rainbow bagel is artful.
Love this bagel joint they the real deal. Reminds me of home.

Ordered chicken noodle soup that was basically hot carrot and celery water with one piece of small chicken and 5 little noodles. Tried contacting Uber eats and the restaurant and they said they can't refund me. Awful service from both them and Uber eats

The BEST NYC bagels in Chicago! When there's a line of folks to the door, you know it could be good. Food was excellent!  Service was also wonderful, friendly, and helpful. Edwin behind the counter was esp. nice & helpful.  I got the bagel with lox spread, toasted.   This is a must if you crave NY bagels, or simply bagels for that matter.

The guys here may get slammed and busy, but know it's all freshly made and cut to order, no prepackaged goodness here. I opted for a triple decker and now I can't stop raving about them, even months later. The quality of the ingredients and food is amazing and a must try. Can't speak for everything but its hands down of the best sandwich's I've found in this city. Get over there and give them a try sometime.
Waited WAY too long for a bagel and wrap. Also, don’t get the juice - it’s not juice - it’s all foam and also takes way too long. Won’t be going back:
Great bagels. Good service. Good selection

I am giving these guys the benefit of the doubt since they are just getting rolling. They are a little slow when it comes to order times and the organization of the place could use some fine tuning. Good food and I will definitely be giving them another try.
Good place, good people
What time do they actually close because it’s definitely not 11 it’s 9:00 and yea

I had the tuna melt which after negotiation, I asked for brown bread. The sandwich came mushy and watery, not crispy, and the taste was really bitter and with regular bread.  Bummer I had great expectations. Now I have to make a tuna melt on my own.

I came here and ordered a turkey club. Instead of a bagel, I received a sub.  It took over 10 minutes to make. A good quality sandwich, you just can't fake.  I'm not sure why, it took so long. 10 minutes to make a cold sandwich is wrong.  They could only offer me turkey bacon. For that my good grace is forsaken.  I thought the staff were quite unprofessional. Something they'd admit in a confessional.  It was like something I could make on my own. I think next time, I will just stay at home.

A real New York style deli with real N Y bagels. Most in Chicago are not authentic. These are the real thing and served the right way. The smear is administered by them not in a tiny cup. They have a wide menu and are really worth the time.
Best bagels in Chicago! Call in advance and if they’re out of variety you want, they’ll bake ‘em to order. Especially like pumpernickel.

Really great spot!!!! And much needed in this neighborhood. Large selection of breakfast sandwiches, pastries, paninis, drinks and snacks. I got the Dumbo (philly bacon, cheese, egg) and it was excellent. Also got the chocolate pound cake, which was a delicious treat. Service was great, food came quickly. Will definitely be back and I highly recommend to anyone near Wrigley looking for a quick, tasty bite
Omg The Meatpacking District sandwich is meat HEAVEN!!!
Great service every time I am there. The food is always fresh and delicious!

BEST CINNAMON RAISIN BAGEL I’ve had in Chicago! They gotta work on the vibe of the place— need music—But the bagels are good as hell. Don’t miss this chance to have top notch bagels in Chicago, and on the north side at that!
Love this place! So many great options, great staff and AMAZING food! Paninis are AMAZING!!!

My wife and I were excited to hear that a “new” New York Deli was opening in Chicago, and they had an exciting juice menu. We arrived around 10:30am and the restaurant was relatively slow (2-3 ppl), however we had to wait over 25 minutes for 2 juices and 2 bagels. The staff were unorganized, running into one another, and had seemingly no designated task. Once we got our order, the juices were not juice. They were ice smoothies. I don’t believe they even owned a juicer. My wife got the Energy Plus and I the Revive. The Revive tasted like ice with blended spinach, same with the carrot and ice smoothie. The only saving grace is that they do have good bagels. As of right now We would only grab bagels to go.
I'd love to order but unfortunately they don't have a fckn bacon egg and cheese sandwich on the trycav website. Like, why?

Not sure how people are saying that the bagels are amazing unless they've never actually had a good bagel. As a former Brooklyn resident, these bagels are ok at best. Both times I've gone there, the bagels a really undercooked, gummy and even slightly raw in the middle. Staff is all over the place and dont seem to know who is supposed to do what.  Unfortunately I also got 2 sandwiches for lunch there also. The lettuce is brown, hardly anything on the sandwich and they are just a mess. I'm done with this place. I should have checked the food before I left a tip.

I’m so happy this place opened. I’ve been on the hunt for true New York bagels and this place is the closest in Chicago. They also feature a deli counter so I’m pumped to try that next.  Super good prices and great food!

As a guy who was born and raised in Bensonhurst Brooklyn ,  I had to try the bagels.  I was pleasantly surprised by them. Bought some plain , sesame and cinnamon raisin bagels . They were fresh and tasted great.  Made me feel back at home in Brooklyn. Even though the store is 20 miles from my home now , I will be returning !   # Brooklyn Rules !

I've been there twice since opening. The bagels are amazing! I had bacon and cheddar in sourdough bagel and also vanilla and walnut on blueberry. Both really really good. The first time I got a bagel sandwich. It was really good, but I prefer CBA for the whole bagel sandwich experience.
Echoing a previous review: good place that has potential but still a few kinks. But the bagels are delicious - the right amount of exterior crunch and interior chewiness.

The place is new and working out the kinks.  On the plus side, a great selection of bagels and cream cheese and really delicious and reasonably priced sandwiches. The staff was friendly and helpful. On the minus side, they REALLY need to get the air conditioning fixed. It was a 90+ degree day and the soda coolers were blasting hot air into an already hot space. And there were a LOT of people working but a lot of confusion it seemed. Definitely try the food and hopefully everything else will improve with time!

Bagels and bagel sandwiches are 5 stars, however the service is 1 Star. I’m attributing that to them being new, but both times I’ve been in they’ve forgotten my order. Hopefully, with time, the service can become more organized. I certainly hope so because their food is amazing.
Tasty bagels!
The bagel sandwiches are great! Very pleasantly surprised by both the quality and the price. We’ll definitely be going back!
The bagels are fantastic,  the cream cheese quality,  taste and variety cannot be beat and the friendliness and enthusiasm of the owner and his father make it the place to go.  Just wonderful!

Bagels were great, but I am just writing this to give the staff some feedback in hopes they’ll improve since I’ll be coming in often. Please find ways to streamline your roles because it seemed that everyone was bumping into each other and duplicating efforts in various ways. In turn, this increased the wait time significantly.  Again, bagels are amazing but it took over 30 mins both times I’ve been.
As I write this, I'm eating a delicious onion bagel with plain cream cheese.  My fiance is loving his everything bagel with veggie cream cheese delicious.  We will definitely be back.
New restaurant to the neighborhood and their menu looks excellent - bagels, sandwiches, coffee, salads, you name it. Great service and the owners seem great. Excited to have them open!
